titles.title: Prohibiting the use of funds in a Members' Representational Allowance for the long-term lease of a vehicle.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 5/8/2008--Introduced. Prohibits the use of funds in a Members' Representational Allowance to lease a vehicle except on a short-term basis, which shall be 10 days or fewer.
